title: Secrets and Deception
description: Mason Harrington has everything he could have ever wanted, except the ability to choose his own fiancé. His father wants him to marry for a business deal and unless he wants to lose everything, then he has to do exactly what his father says.Somehow, he manages to get a three-month reprieve before he has to propose. Volunteering in Africa under a fake name seems like the perfect escape from reality and his roommate for the next three months…gorgeous. Eva Donahue is a walking wet dream and Mason has every intention of bagging her as many times as he can, before reality slaps him in the face.The minute Eva laid eyes on Jason Bourke, she knew she wouldn’t be able to handle living in close quarters with him for the next three months. Especially since the first time they met, he couldn’t take his eyes off her tits. He screams player and Eva wants to stay far, far away from him. Too bad he is about the most attractive man she has ever laid eyes on, but what’s worse is that he knows it.Will Eva be able to resist his charms or will she end up in his bed like so many women before her?Secrets and Deception is the first instalment in the For Keeps series. Due to its explicit content, bad language and graphic sexual content, Secrets and Deception is recommended for mature readers of eighteen years and above.This book ends on a cliffhanger.
author: Alexa  Kane
